output.dependency: The column representing the name of the beer is semantically dependent on the column representing the style of beer, as each specific name corresponds to a particular style.

The column representing the volume measurement has a syntactic dependency on the column representing the ABV (alcohol by volume), as the volume unit format (e.g., '16.0 oz' or '16.0 ounce') precedes the percentage format in the context of beer.
The column representing the brewery name has a semantic dependency on the column representing the city, as all beers are produced by the brewery located in that city.
The column representing the city is semantically dependent on the column representing the state, as it identifies the specific state where the city is located.
